sections.heading: Enaming of Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Creation of Interagency Environmental Justice Response Team Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Rescission of Executive Directive 2018-3; Creation of Office of the Clean Water
sections.text: Enaming of Department of Environmental Quality to Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Creation of Interagency Environmental Justice Response Team Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Rescission of Executive Directive 2018-3; Creation of Office of the Clean Water Public Advocate as Type I Agency Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Creation of Office of Climate and Energy Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Transfer of Portion of Powers and Duties of Michigan Agency for Energy Within Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs to Office of Climate and Energy by Type III Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Office of the Great Lakes Within Department of Natural Resources to Office of the Great Lakes Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy by Type III Transfer; Creation of Office of the Environmental Justice Public Advocate as Type I Agency Within Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Creation of Science Review Boards; Transfer of Positions of Director and Member or Employee of Department of Environmental Quality as Members of State Plumbing Board to Director and Appointee of Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Administration of Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Creation of Michigan Office of Administrative Hearings and Rules as Type I Agency Within Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs; Transfer of Michigan Public Service Commission From Michigan Agency for Energy to Department of Licensing and Regulatory Affairs by Type I Transfer; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan Administrative Hearing System to Michigan Office of Administrative Hearings and Rules; Transfer of Portion of Powers and Duties of Office of Performance and Transformation Within Department of Technology, Management, and Budget to Department of Environment, Great Lakes, and Energy; Abolishment of Office of Performance and Transformation; Transfer of Environmental Science advisor...
